<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass replaces transfer instructions by combine instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We walk along a basic block and look for two combinable instructions and try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to move them together. If we can move them next to each other we do so and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// replace them with a combine instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagoncopytocombine-cpp-/hexagoncopytocombine/#abf1d3632b33378e555096f2a26701f24">HexagonCopyToCombine::ID</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122" lineLink="#a617fe1bd8a84ff20b65809eba1a9b8ef"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h/#af807c9595d50b45c0008924c4679c85c">INITIALIZE&#95;PASS</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagoncopytocombine-cpp-/hexagoncopytocombine/#a529a30bf99919c9fa10d11a33ce60055">HexagonCopyToCombine</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;hexagon-copy-combine&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Hexagon Copy-To-Combine Pass&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125" lineLink="#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101"><span class="doxyHighlight">static </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isCombinableInstType(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagoninstrinfo">HexagonInstrInfo</a> &#42;<a href="#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126" lineLink="#a95756fc2847ee79172165e345f645e86"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a95756fc2847ee79172165e345f645e86">ShouldCombineAggressively</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  case Hexagon::A2&#95;tfr: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A COPY instruction can be combined if its arguments are IntRegs (32bit).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    const MachineOperand &amp;Op0 = MI.getOperand(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    const MachineOperand &amp;Op1 = MI.getOperand(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">    assert(Op0.isReg() &amp;&amp; Op1.isReg());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Register DestReg = Op0.getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Register SrcReg = Op1.getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    return Hexagon::IntRegsRegClass.contains(DestReg) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">           Hexagon::IntRegsRegClass.contains(SrcReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Hexagon::A2&#95;tfrsi: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A transfer-immediate can be combined if its argument is a signed 8bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    const MachineOperand &amp;Op0 = MI.getOperand(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    const MachineOperand &amp;Op1 = MI.getOperand(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    assert(Op0.isReg());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Register DestReg = Op0.getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensure that TargetFlags are MO&#95;NO&#95;FLAG for a global. This is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// workaround for an ABI bug that prevents GOT relocations on combine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    if (!Op1.isImm() &amp;&amp; Op1.getTargetFlags() != HexagonII::MO&#95;NO&#95;FLAG)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">      return false;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only combine constant extended A2&#95;tfrsi if we are in aggressive mode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    bool NotExt = Op1.isImm() &amp;&amp; isInt&lt;8&gt;(Op1.getImm());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    return Hexagon::IntRegsRegClass.contains(DestReg) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">           (ShouldCombineAggressively || NotExt);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the intervening instruction MI:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; modifies I1&#39;s use reg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; modifies I1&#39;s def reg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; reads I1&#39;s def reg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; or has unmodelled side effects</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   We introduce this special case because llvm has no api to remove a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   kill flag for a register (a removeRegisterKilled() analogous to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   addRegisterKilled) that handles aliased register correctly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; or has a killed aliased register use of I1&#39;s use reg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           %d4 = A2&#95;tfrpi 16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           %r6 = A2&#95;tfr %r9</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           %r8 = KILL %r8, implicit killed %d4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      If we want to move R6 = across the KILL instruction we would have</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t combine a TFR whose user could be newified.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that registers are adjacent and that the first destination register</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsI1LowReg = (I2DestReg - I1DestReg) == 1;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that the two instructions are combinable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The order matters because in a A2&#95;tfrsi we might can encode a int8 as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the hi reg operand but only a uint6 as the low reg operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((IsI2LowReg &amp;&amp; !<a href="#aa67934d23b1e9ff1901ec570930128e4">areCombinableOperations</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>, I1, &#42;I2, AllowC64)) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (IsI1LowReg &amp;&amp; !<a href="#aa67934d23b1e9ff1901ec570930128e4">areCombinableOperations</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>, &#42;I2, I1, AllowC64)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isSafeToMoveTogether(I1, &#42;I2, I1DestReg, I2DestReg, DoInsertAtI1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#42;I2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Not safe. Stop searching.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
